Launcher language
Launcher theme
Number of results to download for the changelog:
Number of releases to request:
Custom UI scaling:
Proxy server:
Shows the Debug tab with some testing functions\nand enables debug messages in the status\npane (useful for troubleshooting).
When installing Kenan Modpack, also include *archived* mods.\nThese mods are no longer maintained by Kenan and may be outdated.
If turned off, the launcher will close after clicking Play or Resume.\nNote that if the game fails to start for any reason, the launcher\nwill still close.
How many recent pull requests (code additions)\nwill be requested from GitHub to form the changelog.\nHigh numbers may lead to slow responses and failures.
How many latest releases will be requested\nfrom GitHub after starting the launcher,\nchoosing the game or clicking Refresh.
Print a random tip in the status pane when the launcher starts.
Shorten release names to just the date and number\n(e.g. "2021-09-08-1927"instead of\n"Cataclysm-DDA experimental build 2021-09-08-1927").
Show the installs list even when just one\ncopy of the game is installed, or none at all.
Show a description for the chosen game under the Game list.
Show mods that come with the game but are marked as "obsolete".\nNormally, such mods are not considered as installed.

Use this if the automatically inferred UI scale looks too large
or too small on your system. (Automatic scale relies on
system-reported display DPI, which may not work on all systems,
or give inadequate results when the resolution is too low.)
Allow starting the update procedure even when the selected\nrelease is the same as currently installed.
Keep downloaded contents (game releases, modpacks, soundpacks) in cache folder\nwhen install completes, instead of having it deleted.
Always download contents from the web,\neven if it's already inside cache folder.
Configure a proxy server for downloading.
Disabled - Do not use proxy\nEnabled - Use proxy on all occasions (e.g. requesting releases)\nFor Downloading Only - Use proxy only when downloading
